name: Dungeon Slime 2: Puzzle in the Dark Forest
name_original: Dungeon Slime 2: Puzzle in the Dark Forest
description:
Dungeon Slime 2, it's a spectacular puzzle game with innovative mechanics. You are Billy the slime and you have to change your shape by hitting the walls to get through the challenges. There are several levels to play with increasing difficulty and additional obstacles.

Be Caution of the Plant!



Posicione os Blocos!



Be Caution the thorn!
